job.title: Junior Software Engineer

exciting technology in the transportation and autonomous vehicle industry pilit products are used around the world Continuing our mission to improve safety on every mile of roadwayppnbspppstrongWhat we valuestrongppOur company is driven by three core principles respect integrity and innovationppnbspppstrongIs this youstrongppWe are looking for an experienced fullstack engineer interested in engineering and sales team to define and help develop applications that solve our customers problems You will enjoy the benefits of having direct involvement in the full cycle development of software and productization of solutions that will be used both nationally and internationallyppYou should excel in working with largescale applications frameworks and have outstanding communication and
